sys_ui_message.message:
If you are evaluating the value of something, you can enter a static value or an expression in the Value field. For example:
  • Static Values: a constant value.
  • Expressions: a value based on other objects in the system. You can do the following:
    1. Use form data values using definition expressions. For example: ${parameter.formData.CatalogAttributeType}
    2. Use user data values using definition expressions. For example: ${parameter.userData.userId}
    3. Use Stack/table values using runtime expressions. For example: $(ci.sn_cmp _ip_pool[subnet=${parameter.formData.SubnetId}])
You can also concatenate a static value with an expression.
